title: Business Analyst
description:
HyFun a leading brand in Frozen Food in India with exports in more than 40+ countries is seeking to strengthen its IT Team. We are looking to fill the Assistant Manager - IT Application/Business Analyst




Position/Profile Title: Assistant Manager - IT Application/Business Analyst




Job Location: Ahmedabad (Preference Local candidate)




Preferred Qualification: Minimum Graduate from IT background




Experience: 4 to 10 years




Age Group: up to 32 years




Areas of Expertise required:




Application End to End Implementation cycle ( FMCG related exp added advantage)




Requirement gathering process




Business process documentation




Collaboration with technical team vs stakeholders




Complete understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle ( Moderate level understanding also fine)




Experiencing in Implementation documentation ( Scope , Gap Analysis, CI, CR)




Experience API integration , UAT and Deployment




Interested candidates can send their profiles to vipul.patadiya@hyfunfoods.com with the subject line "Applying for Assistant Manager – IT Application/Business Analyst - Ahmedabad"
